From my battle to our war, MMORPG MIR4

Greetings, This is MIR4. 

We will be conducting Update Maintenance to provide better gaming environment.

Please kindly understand that you can't access the game during the Update Maintenance.

Remember to disconnect from the game at a safe place before the Update Maintenance.

[b]■ Maintenance Schedule [/b]
ASIA(UTC+8): Tuesday, Apr. 18, 2023, 3:30 am ~ 10:00 am
INMENA(UTC+6): Tuesday, Apr. 18, 2023, 1:30 am ~ 8:00 am
EU(UTC+2): Monday, Apr. 17, 2023, 9:30 pm ~ Tuesday, Apr. 18, 2023, 4:00 am
SA(UTC-3): Monday, Apr. 17, 2023, 4:30 pm ~ 11:00 pm
NA(UTC-4): Monday, Apr. 17, 2023, 3:30 pm ~ 10:00 pm

[b]■ Maintenance Target [/b]
- ASIA / INMENA / EU / SA / NA

[b][Main Updates][/b]

[b]◈In-Game Updates◈[/b]

1. New Hell Raid Boss: Blood-Crazed Oddevil
- Get ready for a thrilling showdown with the fearsome Blood-Crazed Oddevil, the new Hell Raid Boss!
2. New Shop Feature: Gift
- Spread the love and surprise your friends and fellow Dragonians by gifting them items from the Shop!
3. [600th Day Celebration] Golden Cherry Blossom Festival event
- Join us in celebrating 600 days of MIR4 with the Golden Cherry Blossom Festival Event! Thank you to our amazing Dragonian community for their love and support!
4. Legendary Spirit Treasure Challenge Event
- It’s back! Don't miss this chance to obtain Legendary Spirit Treasures!

※ This Update Build (Only AOS) is a Clean Build. Based on Mobile Device, it takes 3.82GB of capacity on downloading the patch.
※ Maintenance schedule may change depending on the circumstances without prior notice.
※ You can't access the game during maintenance. 

We will do our best to provide stable service. 

Thank you.
